Trevor Lasn.title: Trevor I. Lasn, Builder and Founder
Trevor Lasn.description: Builder and founder living in Tartu, Estonia. Been coding for over a decade, previously led engineering teams, writing since 2015. I test new tech early, often before the docs exist. I coach and mentor developers because I want to see you win.
